name: My Little Dog Adventure
descr:
In My Little Dog Adventure you play as a little dog that discovers the world on its mission to find its way back home. 

It's a short emotional story-driven exploration game that will keep you interested with an immersive story and lovable characters. 

What to expect? 
[list][li] A sweet little story about a lovable dog and friendship
[/li][li] Story-driven gameplay and puzzle elements
[/li][li] Changing perspectives in storytelling and gameplay
[/li][li] Several huge environments are waiting to be explored
[/li][li] Many secrets that are hidden and are waiting to be discovered
[/li][li] Experience the world as a dog
[/li][li] Become friends with other animals
[/li][li] A lot of fun and emotions are waiting for you[/li][/list]
detail:
名称: My Little Dog Adventure
类型: 动作, 冒险, 休闲, 独立, 模拟
开发商: EpiXR Games UG
发行商: EpiXR Games UG
发行日期: 2020 年 11 月 6 日
review: 全部评测: 褒贬不一 (27) - 此游戏的 27 篇用户评测中有 62% 为好评。
全部评测: 褒贬不一 (27 篇中的 62%) 发布至今
